Material used.Description: HEK293 cells stably expressing wild-type or A30P α-synuclein were used.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P α-synuclein showed a 2-fold increase in protein aggregation compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein aggregation below 1.5-fold compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein aggregation above 1.5-fold compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: Brain tissue from transgenic mice expressing A30P α-synuclein was analyzed.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P α-synuclein exhibited increased pathological inclusions in the substantia nigra.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Pathological inclusions below 10% of total neuronal density.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Pathological inclusions above 10% of total neuronal density.
